0.text: Innate: Malzahar gains  immunity to crowd control and 90%  damage reduction, lingering for 0.25 seconds after taking non- minion damage or negating a  crowd control effect.

1.text: Void Shift's  cooldown refreshes whenever Malzahar takes non- minion damage or is affected by a  crowd control effect, and resets upon respawning.

0.text: Active: Malzahar opens two portals to the void at the target location that are each 200 units away from each other perpendicular to his facing, granting  sight of the area in between. After 0.4 seconds, all enemies between the portals are dealt magic damage and  silenced for a duration.
Passive: Malzahar gains a stack of Zz'Rot Swarm when he casts another ability, up to a maximum of 2.

1.text: Active: Malzahar consumes all Zz'Rot Swarm stacks and, after a 0.5-second delay, summons a  Voidling at the target location. Additional Voidlings are then summoned for each Zz'Rot Swarm stack consumed.

2.text: Voidlings deal magic damage with their attacks. Voidlings deal 50% reduced damage to epic monsters and 200% increased damage to enemy  minions infected by  Malefic Visions.

0.text: Active: Malzahar infects the target enemy's mind, dealing them magic damage every 0.5 seconds over 4 seconds, which refreshes upon damaging them with  Call of the Void or  Nether Grasp.

1.text: If the target dies while infected, they spread Malefic Visions onto the closest nearby enemy and Malzahar restores  2% of his maximum mana.

0.text: Active: Malzahar forms a  tether between him and the target enemy  champion,  knocking them down. Malzahar then  channels for up to 2.5 seconds,  suppressing and  revealing the target and dealing them magic damage every 0.25 seconds,  revealing himself in the process.

1.text: Malzahar will continue to channel so long as the tether is not broken, even if the suppression is removed.

2.text: A Null Zone is opened beneath the target's location at the time of cast that lasts 5 seconds, dealing magic damage every 0.5 seconds to all enemies within, capped at 120 per tick against  minions and  monsters.

origin: 10 / 15 / 20% (+ 2.5% per 100 ap) of target's maximum health
1 / 1.5 / 2% (+ 0.25% per 100 ap) of target's maximum health

3.text: Null Zone will persist even if the channel is interrupted.

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which reveals the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Torment: Dealing ability damage burns enemies, causing them to take「 60 (+ 6% AP) (+ 4% target's maximum health) total magic damage over 4 seconds. 」「 15 (+ 1.5% AP) (+ 1% target's maximum health) magic damage every second for 4 seconds. 」
Unique – Agony: Deal 0% − 12% (based on target's bonus health) bonus magic damage against enemy champions.
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 ability haste.
